title: Zeit the Ship 9/25: Charles Barkley, Ron Paul, Amy Coney Barrett, KKK
itunes:title: Zeit the Ship 9/25: Charles Barkley, Ron Paul, Amy Coney Barrett, KKK
description:
On this edition of Zeit the Ship Jack and Miles discuss Charles Barkley talking spicy on the Lakers v Nuggets series, Ron Paul had a health emergency during a live stream, Amy Coney Barrett is more than likely to be the Supreme Court Nominee, and Trump is "appealing" to Black voters by promising to treat the KKK like a terrorist organization.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
